demographics.experience_level: Mixed (some are very computer literate, others are not)
demographics.technical_proficiency: Varied; some are non-very computer literate

background_context.situation: Interacting with a website for event registration
background_context.environment: Online, possibly in a community or organizational setting
background_context.constraints: Website navigation issues and lack of user guidance for those less experienced with technology

goals_motivations.drives: To have a clear and user-friendly experience on the website
goals_motivations.achievements: Easily find and sign up for events, understand event details such as dates and prices

behaviors_patterns.current_work: Navigating the website to find events and sign up
behaviors_patterns.habits: Relying on orientation sessions or assistance from knowledgeable individuals for guidance

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Difficulty navigating the website, lack of clear event information (dates, availability, costs)
pain_points_frustrations.what_does_not_work: Current website navigation, lack of personalized onboarding for new users

needs_desires.improvements: A walkthrough for new users, improved navigation that is segmented by user demographic, clear event details
needs_desires.looking_for: A better initial experience on the website, easy access to information regarding events

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Belief that better guidance and clearer navigation can improve user experience
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Prefer segmented information that caters to different age groups, values clarity and ease of access

technical_comfort.abilities: Mixed; some users are not very computer literate, while others are experienced
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Prefer guided learning through videos or personal assistance

quotes: If there was some type of video or app or even a committee of people who would be willing to walk people through the website, the people that are sort of non-very computer literate would have a better experience up front.
I think the navigation can be improved because people have a hard time finding where they want to go.
It might be good to have the price of the events shown in the listing because sometimes you get interested in an event and you find out it's $105.
